How can I prove the above without using tauto?

Can someone also please explain what exactly are we asked to prove?

Thank you

This is basically saying, there exists a proposition P such that P is true. Or in other words, there exists a true proposition. So you need to provide a true proposition (e.g., using 'use') and then provide a proof of that proposition.
Pehan Amarathunge has marked this topic as resolved.
